alert.note: Alert for Central La Paz; Parker Valley (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 10 at 4:03PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central La Paz and San Bernardino Counties through 445 PM MST... At 402 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 11 miles southeast of Buckskin Mountain Park, or 12 miles southeast of Parker Dam, moving north at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Buckskin Mountain Park and Parker Dam. This includes AZ Route 95 between mile markers 156 and 160. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
